ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: It doesn t stun them, but it does do damage.  When we re just fighting melee giants, there s usually enough room in my list (at 57) to toss this song in.  I
ygData.messageBody:
It doesn't stun them, but it does do damage. When we're just fighting melee giants, there's usually
enough room in my list (at 57) to toss this song in. I just use it for a little extra damage every five
minutes.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk


"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> umm, i thought you can't stun giants either. could be wrong, i don't kill
> giants anymore, just dorfs and dragons.
>
> Shada
>
> > SoT doesnt interrupt Giants...and in Kael I find BBB kinda
> > useful...problem
> > is it is a one shot pop per fight...the recycle is far to
> > long to chain
> > interrupt as we do with SoT
> >
> > Lago
